name: Neon Paddle Ball
description:
This is a prototype for a Paddle Ball game made for the Godot Wild Jam #39. The theme is "Inversion".

Four inversions can take place during the game:

  1. Paddle Swap - you will take control of  the paddle you currently aren't controlling...
  2. Turn the Table - the game will flip over 180°
  3. Gravity Point Switch - the gravity point could randomly change
  4. Gravity Flip - The gravity from the gravity point is inversed.
